name: Auribus - GWJ #30
description:
To play this game, you do not need to use your eyes!

Follow the adventure of a magic student, in his journey to help someone in a task only he is able to do!

Put headphones, close your eyes, and let yourself be guided by only sound. And yes, you can walk around and there is even combat action using your spells!

(Try not to die, by the way.)

Voice actors:

Vela (madparrot.itch.io)
JohnGabrielUK (johngabrieluk.itch.io)
Lissa (lissaferreira.itch.io)

(Bad sound quality in some voices is Vela's fault.)
